ai-patthana15.9:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.9:0.3_0: And for the sake of seeing the causes and reason.
ai-patthana15.9:1.1_0: Because of seeing should be given up by seeing. Because of seeing the causes and conditions should be given up.
ai-patthana15.9:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the principle that should not give up some by developing.
ai-patthana15.9:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.9:3.1_0: Because of this thing, no matter should be given up.
ai-patthana15.9:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
